SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.userregistration.constant

Class SQLConstants

java.lang.Object
com.litmus7.userregistration.constant.SQLConstants
public class SQLConstants extends Object
Defines SQL queries and column names used for user-related database operations.

This class centralizes all SQL statements and column name constants to promote maintainability and prevent hard-coded values throughout the codebase.
